narrow.comment: Use Mark for MC Narrow for text smaller or equal to 14-pixels in all digital applications. It provides greater legibility for body copy, tight columns, or charts. 12-pixels is the minimum size for Narrow.

narrow-medium.comment: Use Mark for MC Narrow for text smaller or equal to 14-pixels in all digital applications. It provides greater legibility for body copy, tight columns, or charts. 12-pixels is the minimum size for Narrow.

narrow-bold.comment: Use Mark for MC Narrow for text smaller or equal to 14-pixels in all digital applications. It provides greater legibility for body copy, tight columns, or charts. 12-pixels is the minimum size for Narrow.

regular.comment: Use Mark for MC for text slightly larger than 14-pixels in all digital applications.

extra-light.comment: Use Mark for MC for text slightly larger than 14-pixels in all digital applications.

light.comment: Use Mark for MC for text slightly larger than 14-pixels in all digital applications.

medium.comment: Use Mark for MC for text slightly larger than 14-pixels in all digital applications.

bold.comment: Default bold weight font used across application
